ygData.subject: Heritrix 2.0.0 Job start
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am new to heritrix. I wanted to run the crawler from the command-line. what are the options for running cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar? I have had a

Hi all,

I am new to heritrix. I wanted to run the crawler from the command=
-line.
what are the options for running cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar?
I hav=
e had a look at http://crawler.archive.org/cmdline-jmxclient/

java -jar cm=
dline-jmxclient.jar USER:PASS HOST:PORT [BEAN] [COMMAND]

Where can I find =
a list of [BEAN]'s available and the related command?
I am using heritrix-2=
.0.0-dist.tar.gz.

The whole idea is to run the crawler and be able to star=
t/pause/stop jobs remotely.

I understand that heritrix 2.0.0 doesnt have o=
rder.xml. If I need to remotely start a job, I will need to create the appo=
priate folder (E.g. ready-44, if the jobname is 44) in jobs/ directory. In =
this folder I will need to store a seeds.txt file and a folder called 'shee=
ts' with a global.sheet file in it.

How do I start/stop/pause this job usi=
ng cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar?

Do I need to start Heritrix without Webui=
 suppot (./heritrix -n) to use the cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar tool?

I ge=
t the following error as I try to shutdown heritrix from the cmdline:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
----

lient-0.10.5.jar controlRole:admin localhost:8080 org.archive.crawler:jmxpo=
rt=3D8849,name=3DHeritrix,type=3DCrawlService,guiport=3D8080,host=3Dpk shut=
down
